```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
```

# import data

```{r}
red = read_excel(path = "./data/wine.xlsx", sheet = "red") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(category = "red")

white = read_excel(path = "./data/wine.xlsx", sheet = "white") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(category = "white")

wine = rbind(red, white)
```
